    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()

      • getDb

        public Database getDb()
        Watches should never write data to the database directly unless absolutely necessary.
        Returns:
        The database the group operates on.

      • write

        public void write(Watch watch,
                  SubscriptionValue sv)
        Writes to the database based on the watch group settings.
        Parameters:
        watch - Watch to write from.
        sv - Subscription update received from the server.

      • initWatch

        protected void initWatch(java.lang.String path)
        Initializes the watch for the group.
        Parameters:
        path - Watch path.

      • subscribe

        public void subscribe()
        Subscribes to the entire watch group.

      • unsubscribe

        public void unsubscribe()
        Unsubscribes from the entire watch group.

      • initSettings

        protected void initSettings()
        All settings must be as actions and their default parameters should be updated when changed. Be sure to call super on this method.
